item.description: Note: This schedule may be updated as the semester progresses, with all changes documented here. Due dates for the exams and project will not be changed. May 18: Clarified schedule re: “assigned” HW and labs vs. bonus labs for no credit; fixed lab dates. July 01: Updated schedule to reflect July 04 Holiday. On Monday, July 06, Midterm Review 02 has been replaced by Lecture 15 which was originally scheduled for Friday, July 03.

item.title: Course Policies
item.description: Important Administrative Details STA 198L is a unique two-part online course that spans both summer sessions at Duke University. This course is split into two half-credit sessions: STA 198L-1 and STA 198L-2. Students must enroll in and complete both sections within the same summer in order to receive credit. This course will be graded on the traditional letter scale. All students will receive a Z grade upon completion of STA 198L-1.
